Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
Reviews.Author: khalib
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED THE BLACKBERRY Q5 TODAY AND THOUGHT I COULD GET A TMOBILE SIM CARD AND INSERT IT AND BOOM I WOULD BE UP AND RUNNING BUT WAS WRONG, ITS STILL UNDER AT&T; NETWORK AND UNLOCKING THE PHONE IS SAID TO BE DONE ON MY OWN WHICH MEANS THIS PHONE WILL BE SHIPPED BACK

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
3G 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen with16M colors
microSD expandable up to 32GB (memory card not included)
8 GB with 2 GB RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Q5 3G, 5MP, 8GB, Dual-Core Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - Black
